tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ManufacturingFacilities (
	facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	facility_name VARCHAR(255),
	location VARCHAR(255),
	inspection_date DATE,
	compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceReports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	facility_id INT NOT NULL,
	inspection_date DATE,
	compliance_score FLOAT
	FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES ManufacturingFacilities(facility_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ManufacturingFacilities (
    facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    inspection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Inspectors (
    inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
    specialization VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_id INT,
    inspector_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    result VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES ManufacturingFacilities(facility_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (inspector_id) REFERENCES Inspectors(inspector_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Violations (
    violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inspection_id INT,
    violation_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (inspection_id) REFERENCES Inspections(inspection_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ManufacturingFacilities (
  facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  inspection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Inspectors (
  inspector_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  certification_date DATE NOT NULL,
  contact_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspector_id INT NOT NULL,
  facility_id INT NOT NULL,
  inspection_date DATE,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Violations (
  violation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_id INT NOT NULL,
  violation_description TEXT,
  penalty_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_id INT NOT NULL,
  inspection_id INT NOT NULL,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)
